meanings.sent1: The triradiate starfish had three long arms.
meanings.sent2: The triradiate symbol on the wall represented unity.
meanings.sent3: The triradiate tree looked like it was waving hello with its three branches.
meanings.sent4: Her triradiate hair sparkled in the sunlight, resembling a crown.
meanings.sent5: The triradiate pattern on the carpet made the room feel more spacious.

meanings.definition: A structure or organism with three radiating parts.
meanings.sent1: The triradiate antenna of the insect helped it detect predators from different angles.
meanings.sent2: The triradiate flower bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The triradiate sculpture in the park made people stop and take a closer look.
meanings.sent4: The triradiate design of the building's roof added a unique touch to the skyline.
meanings.sent5: The triradiate pattern on the butterfly's wings mesmerized onlookers.
